text: @HillaryClinton If youve recovered from COVID-19 please consider becoming a plasma donor. Many local hospitals all participating in a trial through the FDA and the Mayo clinic using convalescent plasma as a possible treatment in COVID-19 patients. Register at Red Cross https://t.co/wvCJpj6pkE
